page.title: 02CROP SPRAYING
page.content: Agricultural farmers use sprayers to spray all kinds of spray on their crops . In a sprayers tank it holds 450 gallons or 2045 litres . Usally you spray fields twice a month or more. Most people mind the spray killing rare insects and plants. To kill all green growing plants we use Gramoxo or Round Up . Lots of people dont like the spray harming them. We asked some people if they used weedkiller and all different kinds of sprays and they said they did. On the next page are some different sprays that are used for different weeds and for plants that kill the crops .
